desc: Established in 1995 and serving the Calgary music communities esoteric needs ever since. We carry a selection of rock, pop, indie, punk, metal, hip-hop, jazz, as well as a good number of audiophile labels.Tons of new releases weekly as well as reissues and an ever changing selection of used titles.

layout.text: Looking to sell or trade your collection? Feel free to give us a call or email.
